zserio.runtime.io

Class ByteArrayBitStreamWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • zserio.runtime.io.ByteArrayBitStreamWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, BitStreamWriter

    public final class ByteArrayBitStreamWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BitStreamWriter
    A bit stream writer using byte array.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int bitOffset
      The current bit offset.

      The default character set.
